name: SmartWalletRevertReasonHelperV3
description: SmartWalletRevertReasonHelperV3. This contract takes revert reason "codes" and returns revert reason strings for use in handling failures on the Dharma Smart Wallet.

functionDecorators.name: reason
functionDecorators.description: Pure function to retrieve a revert reason string for a given code.

parameterDecorators.name: code
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 The code for the revert reason.
